props.name: cls
props.desc: CSS class to add to the element

props.name: constrain
props.desc: False to disable constrain to viewport (defaults to true)

props.name: dh
props.desc: DomHelper object config to create element with (defaults to {tag: "div", cls: "x-layer"}).

props.name: shadow
props.desc:
True to create a shadow element with default class "x-layer-shadow", or
you can pass a string with a CSS class name. False turns off the shadow.

props.name: shadowOffset
props.desc: Number of pixels to offset the shadow (defaults to 3)

props.name: shim
props.desc: False to disable the iframe shim in browsers which need one (defaults to true)
